author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MAJOR HURRICANE FLOSSIE BRINGING GUSTY WINDS AND RAIN TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO...
summary: ...MAJOR HURRICANE FLOSSIE BRINGING GUSTY WINDS AND RAIN TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... As of 8:00 PM MST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 18.2, -107.4 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 962 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
